Deleting your cache directory will cause: 删除缓存目录将导致您丢失某些设置。除非是在 Streamlabs 员工指导下进行操作，否则请不要删除缓存目录
Confirm stream title and game before goi: 直播前确认直播标题和游戏
Enable reporting additional information: 启用报告有关崩溃的附加信息（需要重新启动）
WARNING! You will lose all scenes, sourc: 警告！将丢失所有场景、源和设置。此操作无法撤消！
Your cache directory has been successful: 您的缓存目录已成功上传。文件名 %{file}已复制到剪贴板。
Stream Labels session has been successfu: 直播标签进程已成功重新启动！
This action will restart the application: 此操作将重新启动应用程序。继续？
Show confirmation dialog when starting s: 开始直播时显示确认对话框
Show confirmation dialog when stopping s: 停止直播时显示确认对话框
Enforce streaming service bitrate limits: 强制流服务比特率限制
Encoder Preset (Higher = Less CPU): 编码器预设（高 = 低 CPU）
Generate File Name without Space: 生成不含空格的文件名
Bilinear (Fastest, but blurry if scaling: 双线性（最快，但若缩放则模糊）
Bicubic (Sharpened scaling, 16 samples): 双三次（锐化标度，16 个样本）
No elements found. Consider changing the: 未找到元素。考虑更改搜索查询。
Do not back up my media files in the clo: 不要在云端备份我的媒体文件（需要重新启动应用程序）
Disable Windows audio ducking: 禁用 Windows 音频隐藏
Preserved cutoff point (increase delay): 重新连接时保留的截止点（增加延迟）
Single click selects group. Double click: 单击选择组。双击选择项
Double click selects group. Single click: 双击选择组。单击选择项
Navigate to Live tab when going live: 上线时打开直播选项卡
Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced: 直播到自定义摄取是高级功能。某些功能可能会停止按预期工作
Disable hardware acceleration (requires: 禁用硬件加速（需要重新启动）
Deleting your cache directory will cause: 删除缓存目录将导致您丢失某些设置。除非是在 Streamlabs 员工指导下进行操作，否则请不要删除缓存目录。
You can not change these settings when y: 直播时无法更改这些设置
This feature is intended for overlay des: 此功能旨在供叠加层设计人员导出其主题商店的作品。并非所有来源均可导出，使用后果自负。
Change the look of Streamlabs Desktop wi: 通过 Prime 更改 Streamlabs Desktop 的外观
Maximum custom destinations has been add: 已添加最大自定义目的地数量
The Virtual Webcam plugin needs to be up: 虚拟网络摄像头插件需要更新才能启动。这需要管理员权限。
Virtual Webcam requires administrator pr: 虚拟网络摄像头需要管理员权限以安装到您的系统上。
Virtual webcam is <status>Running</statu: 虚拟网络摄像正在<status>运行</status>
If the virtual webcam does not appear in: 如果虚拟网络摄像头没有出现在其他应用程序中，您可能需要重新启动计算机。
Virtual Webcam allows you to display you: 虚拟网络摄像头允许您在视频会议软件中显示来自 Streamlabs Desktop 的场景。Streamlabs Desktop 将在大多数视频会议应用程序中显示为可选择的网络摄像头。
Uninstalling Virtual Webcam will remove: 卸载虚拟网络摄像头会将其从其他应用程序的可选设备中移除。
The diagnostic report is an automaticall: The diagnostic report is an automatically generated report that contains information about your system and configuration. Clicking the upload button below will generate and securely transmit a diagnostic report to the Streamlabs team.
There was an error uploading the diagnos: There was an error uploading the diagnostic report. Please try again, and let the Streamlabs Streamer Success team know if the issue persists.
The diagnostic report was securely uploa: The diagnostic report was securely uploaded, and the Report ID below has been copied to your clipboard. Please provide the Report ID to the Streamlabs Streamer Success Team.
Show announcements for new Streamlabs fe: Show announcements for new Streamlabs features and products
